name: bicial
description: Binaural CI Alignment tool for cochlear implant users
author: Christoph Zwerschke <cito@online.de>

scripts.start: xdg-open index.html || open index.html || start index.html
scripts.serve: npx http-server -p 8000 -o || python3 -m http.server 8000 || python -m http.server 8000 || php -S localhost:8000 -t .
